plot: Eurocinema presents award winning feature films paired with shorts from around the world. In this selection we begin with the short film Nom Dit immediately followed by our feature Dying in Athens.
title: Pethainontas stin Athina
plot_es: Eurocinema presents award winning feature films paired with shorts from around the world. In this selection we begin with the short film Nom Dit immediately followed by our feature Dying in Athens.
